title: Campagnolo Patent Hints at Use of Thumb Shifter on Future Super Record Wireless Group
content:
The patent in question suggests that a single paddle could be used to signal both up- and down-shifts. Not only that, it could be wearable!

Read the full article at Campagnolo Patent Hints at Use of Thumb Shifter on Future Super Record Wireless Group on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
